body:
Hey,
Currently i have nothing to do right now because i have done what i needed for school i was hoping i could have a job that involves avicus now this thread is mostly pointed to staff members if you do have a job i can do please be respectful about it and i will pretty much do anything if you need me to work for someone or help with tournements or anything i will do it

-Thanks

title: Im Looking For Job

replies.body:
For all jobs you must apply when the time comes xd.
It's not a ask and get place.

No place in life you shall get a job without having to work for it.

Are you looking for a paid job or to work as a volunteer?

replies.body: IMO, being a staff member is not a "job", it's about voluntarily work to help out. Either way, it's to make maps.
